CustomField.description: Group parent client for the economic group client hierarchy as represented in credit risk (Adaptiv)
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Economic_Group_Parent__c) && Adaptive_Flag__c = TRUE , Name, IF(Not( Economic_Group_Parent__c = ""), Economic_Group_Parent__r.Name,""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Group parent client for the economic group client hierarchy as represented in credit risk (Adaptiv)
CustomField.label: Economic Group Parent Client Name
